resources.string:
Before you begin: by using this app:
- You agree to allow the app to store your phone number locally.
- You agree to allow the app to conect to internet to fetch latest information from Cowin Goverment Website.
- You agree to allow app to read your message for OTP based authentication
- You agree that you are responsible for the internet usage of this app
- You are responsible for all the traffic on the Government website which the app will create once it starts fetching information.
